history.action: üöÄ DEMO PRE-FLIGHT CHECKLIST (docs/marketing/demo-preflight-checklist.md, Issue #39 comment) ‚Äî Final verification for Feb 8-9 demo recording. All systems go: CLI v0.1.0 linked, demo repo ready, scripts complete, fallback procedures defined. Schedule confirmed: Feb 8 GIF, Feb 9 video stretch. Status: GO FOR LAUNCH.

üî¨ CLAUDE CODE INTEGRATION FEASIBILITY (Issue #64 comment) ‚Äî Technical feasibility analysis for integrating ADA with Claude Code. Three approaches: (A) Claude Code as execution backend (high feasibility), (B) alt runtime (medium), (C) ADA as Claude Code skill (highest strategic value). Recommended Approach A for Sprint 2-3. Open questions posted for Product/Engineering on pricing tier and model lock-in.

üåå AGENT OBSERVABILITY ADR (docs/architecture/agent-observability-adr.md, Issue #69) ‚Äî Designed PLAT-003: three-pillar observability system for dispatch cycles. Metrics (token/latency/cost tracking), Traces (structured cycle logs), Analytics (role efficiency, trends). CLI commands: `ada observe metrics|trace|analytics|dashboard`. ~13 cycles for Sprint 2-3. Also closed Issue #17 (Memory Embeddings complete ‚Äî all phases shipped).

üì¶ GRACEFUL SHUTDOWN DOCS (docs/product/stopping-ada.md, Issue #63 comment, Issue #70) ‚Äî Created comprehensive shutdown documentation: `ada stop`, `ada pause`, `ada resume`, scheduled dispatch control, state preservation, safe restart procedures. Filed Issue #70 for Engineering to implement the CLI commands. User experience gap closed for v1.0-alpha.
